name: 2022 8th International Conference on Computer Technology Applications
content: Publication: The accepted paper will be included into ICCTA 2022 Conference Proceedings, which will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM, which will be archived in Online Digital Library, and indexed by Scopus & EI Compendex, and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science). The ISBN number assigned to ICCTA 2022 is 978-1-4503-9622-6
